description: Analyzes input text for the presence of personally identifiable information (PII) and returns the labels of identified PII entity types such as name, address, bank account number, or phone number.

parameters.name: Text
parameters.description: A UTF-8 text string. The maximum string size is 100 KB.

parameters.name: LanguageCode
parameters.description: The language of the input documents.

nested_items.name: Labels
nested_items.description: The labels used in the document being analyzed. Individual labels represent personally identifiable information (PII) entity types.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend has in the accuracy of the detection.
